name: Rhythm Fire - VR
description:
A little VR rhythm game I developed for a hackathon.
Rhythm Fire only runs on quest and quest 2 at the moment.

Targets spawn to the rhythm of the music and you shoot fireworks to destroy them.

This is also my first game built in Unity and in VR. I developed it in a little under three weeks with no prior experience so it's pretty bare bones. Feel free to play and let me know what you think.

Sidequest Link: https://sidequestvr.com/app/9756/rhythm-fire
